short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use ChatGPT right on the page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ChatGPT Chrome Extension that integrates ChatGPT directly into your browsing experience. With this extension, you can obtain ChatGPT's response to any selected text by simply right-clicking and choosing the 'Send to ChatGPT' option. The AI-generated response will be displayed directly on the webpage without navigating away.

Features:
Seamless integration with your web browsing experience
Easy access to ChatGPT with just a right-click
Quick responses to your questions and queries
Access to the official OpenAI API for GPT-3
Feedback to improve ChatGPT
